00030 {
00031     QString const SW_CREATE_NAMES[SW_CREATE_COUNT] =
00032     {
00033         "SW Application\nCreates a software component for packetizing application code.",
00034         "MCAPI Endpoints\nCreates a software component for packetizing MCAPI endpoints.",
00035         "SW Platform\nCreates a flat (non-hierarchical) software platform component.",
00036         "SW Platform Stack\nCreates a hierarchical software platform for combining software platform components."
00037     };
00038 }
00039 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 // Function: NewSWComponentPage()
00041 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 NewSWComponentPage::NewSWComponentPage(LibraryInterface* libInterface,
00043                                        QWidget* parentDlg) : libInterface_(libInterface), vlnvEditor_(0),
00044                                                              directoryEdit_(0)
00045 {
00046     // Create the title and description labels labels.
00047     QLabel* titleLabel = new QLabel(tr("New SW Component"), this);
00048 
00049     QFont font = titleLabel->font();
00050     font.setPointSize(12);
00051     font.setBold(true);
00052     titleLabel->setFont(font);
00053 
00054     QLabel* descLabel = new QLabel(tr("Creates a SW component"), this);
00055 
00056     // Create the SW create type radio button group and a layout for it.
00057     typeGroup_ = new QGroupBox(tr("Type"), this);
00058     QGridLayout* itemLayout = new QGridLayout(typeGroup_);
00059 
00060     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < SW_CREATE_COUNT; ++i)
00061     {
00062         typeButtons_[i] = new QRadioButton(SW_CREATE_NAMES[i], typeGroup_);
00063         itemLayout->addWidget(typeButtons_[i], i, 0, 1, 1);
00064     }
00065 
00066     typeButtons_[0]->setChecked(true);
00067 
00068     // Create the VLNV editor.
00069     vlnvEditor_ = new VLNVEditor(VLNV::COMPONENT, libInterface, parentDlg, this, true);
00070     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00071     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateDirectory()));
00072 
00073     // Create the directory line edit and label.
00074     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory:"), this);
00075 
00076     QSettings settings;
00077     QString defaultDir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00078     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(defaultDir, this);
00079     connect(directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00080 
00081     QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton("Browse...", this);
00082     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00083     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00084     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00085     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_, 1);
00086     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00087 
00088     // Setup the layout.
00089     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00090     layout->addWidget(titleLabel);
00091     layout->addWidget(descLabel);
00092     layout->addSpacing(12);
00093     layout->addWidget(typeGroup_);
00094     layout->addWidget(vlnvEditor_);
00095     layout->addSpacing(12);
00096     layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00097     layout->addStretch(1);
00098 }

00107 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 // Function: selectDirectory()
00109 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 void NewSWComponentPage::selectDirectory()
00111 {
00112     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00113         directoryEdit_->text());
00114 
00115     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00116     {
00117         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00118     }
00119 }
00120 
00121 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 // Function: prevalidate()
00123 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 bool NewSWComponentPage::prevalidate() const
00125 {
00126     return (vlnvEditor_->isValid() && !directoryEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00127 }
00128 
00129 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 // Function: validate()
00131 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 bool NewSWComponentPage::validate()
00133 {
00134     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00135 
00136     // Check if the VLNV already exists.
00137     if (libInterface_->contains(vlnvEditor_->getVLNV()))
00138     {
00139         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00140             tr("The SW component cannot be created because the VLNV already exists in the library."),
00141             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00142         msgBox.exec();
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145 
00146     return true;
00147 }
00148 
00149 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 // Function: apply()
00151 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152 void NewSWComponentPage::apply()
00153 {
00154     // Determine the create type.
00155     SWCreateType createType = SW_CREATE_APPLICATION;
00156 
00157     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < SW_CREATE_COUNT; ++i)
00158     {
00159         if (typeButtons_[i]->isChecked())
00160         {
00161             createType = static_cast<SWCreateType>(i);
00162             break;
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166     emit createSWComponent(createType, vlnvEditor_->getVLNV(), directoryEdit_->text());
00167 }
00168 
00169 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 // Function: onPageChange()
00171 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 bool NewSWComponentPage::onPageChange()
00173 {
00174     // Reset all fields.
00175     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(VLNV());
00176     typeButtons_[0]->setChecked(true);
00177     return true;
00178 }
00179 
00180 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 // Function: updateDirectory()
00182 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 void NewSWComponentPage::updateDirectory()
00184 {
00185     QSettings settings;
00186     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00187 
00188     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00189 
00190     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00191     {
00192         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00193 
00194         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00195         {
00196             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00197 
00198             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00199             {
00200                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00201 
00202                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00203                 {
00204                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00205                 }
00206             }
00207         }
00208     }
00209 
00210     directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00211 }
